thread.title: California schools to be barred from using 'Redskins' as team name or mascot
thread.title_full: California schools to be barred from using 'Redskins' as team name or mascot - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: California schools to be barred from using 'Redskins' as team name or mascot
text: Melanie MasonContact Reporter Gov. Jerry Brown approved a measure prohibiting public schools from using the term " Redskins " as their team names or mascots on Sunday, but he nixed a separate measure that would have barred public properties
